TEXT.TITLE: IROQUOIS BRANDS LTD <IBL> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss 97 cts vs loss 73 cts Oper net loss 883,000 vs loss 659,000 Revs 19.4 mln vs 16.7 mln 12 mths Oper shr loss 2.37 dlrs vs loss 1.97 dlrs Oper net loss 2,228,000 vs loss 2,145,000 Revs 72.4 mln vs 63.8 mln NOTE: Excludes gain 3.41 dlrs a share versus gain 41 cts in the quarter, and gain 5.68 dlrs a share versus gain 1.99 dlrs in the year from discontinued and disposed operations. Reuter
